"Revelations," Part 3 (of 6),2007,10
With only a few "pieces" of Lucifer left to destroy, Ghost Rider comes face-to-face with "the one that got away"...as well as the fact that he can't do anything to stop him! With the lives of innocent children hanging in the balance, Ghost Rider must race against the clock to save both them and-as if that weren't enough-the entire mortal plane, as well! Meanwhile, two new combatants have entered the fray: Vraniel and Emmael. Ghost Rider needs help--but are they the answer to his prayers? They are, after all, angels...
32 PGS./Parental Advisory ...$2.99
